item.description:
SAT AUG 7 at 7:30 pm -Singles Outdoor Glow Ball Mini Golf and Pizza Party!

Imagine Playing Mini Golf at night in total darkness – using a glowing GLOW Golf Ball, aiming at GLOW Cups, guided by GLOW Strip Lighting!

Meet and Compete with other singles to win prizes and awards – and have an experience that you will never forget.

The evening starts out at our own private area with a PIZZA buffet starring some of the best pizza available in the state. Hang out, enjoy great pizza, meet new friends and your competition to becoming a Mini-Golf GLOW Champ! Teams will be set up for you to compete for high (low) score and bragging rights.

We hit the course at 9:00pm and play the entire course with only GLOW power to find our champ.

After the awards and prizes, we can join the band inside for some rock and roll and dancing.

The fun starts at 7:30 pm and continues all night long!

Billy-Tee's Bar and Grill
Torza's Professional Golf Center
150 Sebethe Road
Cromwell, CT 06416

Exit 21 off 91

Advance Tickets are only $20 or $25 at the event


Visit http://www.SinglesCT.... or call (860) 236-3343 for more info
item.how_to_find_us: Follow the Singles CT PARTY TONIGHT signs

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: SAT AUG 7 at 7:30 pm -Singles Outdoor Glow Ball Mini Golf and Pizza Party!
